name: Run N Dash
description:
Run N Dash is our submission for the GMTK 2018 jam.

The theme is "GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC".

Run N Dash is a Hack 'n' Slash game without any direct ways of fighting enemies.

In order to fight you must roll away and get the enemies to hurt each other with their attacks. Enemies will explode on death which can cause chain explosions, use this to your advantage.

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Space to Roll

(Compatible with controller)

Credits:

Art and Music: Blukiwi

Programming and Level Design: Gregor
